TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ClientIDMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 ASP.NET 如何为客户端脚本中可以访问的控件生成 。

span.span: Specifies how ASP.NET generates the for a control that can be accessed in client script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设置控件的属性时, 可以使用枚举。You use the enumeration when you set the property for a control. 为属性分配的值确定如何生成属性。The value that you assign to the property determines how the property is generated. 属性的值呈现为标记中的`id`属性, 它是用于从客户端脚本访问控件的值。The value of the property is rendered as the `id` attribute in markup, and it is the value that you use to access the control from client script. 分配给属性的值不会影响`id`服务器控件的属性, 而只会影响相应 HTML 元素的属性。The value that you assign to the property does not affect the property of the server control, only the `id` attribute of the corresponding HTML element. 页面的默认值是可预测的。The default value of for a page is Predictable. 控件的默认值为 "继承"。The default value of for a control is Inherit. 由于控件的默认值是继承的, 因此默认生成模式是可预测的。Because the default for controls is Inherit, the default generation mode is Predictable. (但是, 如果使用 Visual Studio 将 Web 项目从早期版本转换为 ASP.NET 4, 则 Visual Studio 会自动将该站点默认设置为 web.config 文件中的 AutoID。)(However, if you use Visual Studio to convert a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the site default to AutoID in the Web.config file.) 通过在站点的`ClientIDMode` web.config 文件中设置[pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458)元素, 你可以为网站中的所有页面设置值。You can set the `ClientIDMode` value for all pages in a Web site by setting the [pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458) element in the site's Web.config file. 您可以在`ClientIDMode` [@ page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指令中设置页的值。You can set the `ClientIDMode` value for a page in the [@ Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 服务器控件标识](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7). ## Examples 下面的示例演示 控件中包含的控件。The following example shows controls that are contained in a control. 在控件上 , 将属性设置为可预测, 并将属性设置为`ProductID`。 On the control, the property is set to Predictable and the property is set to `ProductID`. 通过客户端脚本, 你可以基于 `ProductID`你尝试访问的实例的值访问的特定实例。From client script, you can access a particular instance of a based on the `ProductID` value of the instance that you are trying to access. 此示例创建包含三个`ProductIDLabel`控件的 HTML。This example creates HTML with three `ProductIDLabel` controls. 当页面运行时, 控件的 Id 将如下所示:When the page runs, the IDs for the controls will be the following: - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_1` - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_34` - `ListView1_ProductIDLabel_43` 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web Server Control 标识](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)

related.span: 如何：按 ID 从 JavaScript 访问控件

span.span: How to: Access Controls from JavaScript by ID

related.span: 演练：使数据绑定控件更易于从 JavaScript 进行访问

span.span: Walkthrough: Making Data-Bound Controls Easier to Access from JavaScript

related.span: 演练：使位于 Web 用户控件中的控件更易于从 JavaScript 访问

span.span: Walkthrough: Making Controls Located in Web User Controls Easier to Access From JavaScript

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode AutoID = int32(1)

summary.span: 值是通过串联每个父命名容器的 值生成的，这些父命名容器都具有控件的 值。

span.span: The value is generated by concatenating the values of each parent naming container with the value of the control.

summary.span: 在呈现控件的多个实例的数据绑定方案中，将在控件的 值的前面插入递增的值。

span.span: In data-binding scenarios where multiple instances of a control are rendered, an incrementing value is inserted in front of the control's value.

summary.span: 各部分之间用下划线字符 (_) 分隔。

span.span: Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).

summary.span: 此算法是 ASP.NET 4 以前的 ASP.NET 版本中唯一可以使用的算法。

span.span: This algorithm is the only one that was available in versions of ASP.NET earlier than ASP.NET 4.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode Inherit = int32(0)

summary.span: 控件继承其 控件的 设置。

span.span: The control inherits the setting of its control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode Predictable = int32(2)

summary.span: 对于数据绑定控件中的控件使用此算法。

span.span: This algorithm is used for controls that are in data-bound controls.

summary.span: 值是通过串联每个父命名容器的 值生成的，这些父命名容器都具有控件的 值。

span.span: The value is generated by concatenating the value of the parent naming container with the value of the control.

summary.span: 如果控件是生成多个行的数据绑定控件，则在末尾添加 属性中指定的数据字段的值。

span.span: If the control is a data-bound control that generates multiple rows, the value of the data field specified in the property is added at the end.

summary.span: 对于 控件，可以指定多个数据字段。

span.span: For the control, multiple data fields can be specified.

summary.span: 如果 属性为空白，则在末尾添加顺序号，而非数据字段值。

span.span: If the property is blank, a sequential number is added at the end instead of a data field value.

summary.span: 各部分之间用下划线字符 (_) 分隔。

span.span: Each segment is separated by an underscore character (_).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode Static = int32(3)

summary.span: 值设置为 属性的值。

span.span: The value is set to the value of the property.

summary.span: 如果控件是命名容器，则该控件将用作其所包含的任何控件的命名容器的顶层。

span.span: If the control is a naming container, the control is used as the top of the hierarchy of naming containers for any controls that it contains.
